Review: It’s the best post-apocalyptic CRPG I’ve played since Fallout: New Vegas, and one of the better RPGs I’ve played in a while.
Soulful, technically proficient and at times almost tearfully beautiful.
Enderal is a deeply satisfying game that is as masterful as it is impressive.
The perfect game to end the saga. The mainstory is pretty straight forward and not too stretched out.
Cartel Tycoon is an Early Access game, but even so, it's sleek and visually polished.
The gameplay of It Takes Two fares better than its writing. We need a break from this divorce game.
If you have ever liked tower defense games this is for you.
Forza Horizon 4 is remarkable game. It's a racer for everybody, but with enough depth and difficulty to satisfy experienced gamers.
Capturing exactly what makes the genre tick, this is perhaps the best looter-shooter game since Borderlands.
